verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> consenting <S%G4909><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> death <S%G336><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2250><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> they were <S%G1289><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> scattered abroad <S%G1289><s%> throughout <S%G2596><s%> the regions <S%G5561><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%>, except <S%G4133><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> devout <S%G2126><s%> men <S%G435><s%> carried <S%G4792><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%> to his burial, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> lamentation <S%G2870><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

As <S%G1161><s%> for Saul <S%G4569><s%>, he made havock <S%G3075><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%>, entering into <S%G1531><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, and haling <S%G4951><s%> <S%G5037><s%> men <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> committed <S%G3860><s%> them to <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>.
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> they that were scattered abroad <S%G1289><s%> went every where <S%G1330><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> went down <S%G2718><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of Samaria <S%G4540><s%>, and preached <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> with one accord <S%G3661><s%> gave heed <S%G4337><s%> unto those things which Philip <S%G5376><s%> spake <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5259><s%>, hearing <S%G1722><s%> <S%G191><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%> the miracles <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, crying <S%G994><s%> with loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, came out <S%G1831><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> that were possessed <S%G2192><s%> with them: and <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> taken with palsies <S%G3886><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that were lame <S%G5560><s%>, were healed <S%G2323><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> there was a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, called <S%G3686><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>, which beforetime <S%G4391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same city <S%G4172><s%> used sorcery <S%G3096><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bewitched <S%G1839><s%> the people <S%G1484><s%> of Samaria <S%G4540><s%>, giving out <S%G3004><s%> that himself <S%G1438><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> great one <S%G3173><s%>:

To whom <S%G3739><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> gave heed <S%G4337><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> the least <S%G3398><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the greatest <S%G3173><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, This man <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> they had regard <S%G4337><s%>, because <S%G1223><s%> that of long <S%G2425><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> he had bewitched <S%G1839><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with sorceries <S%G3095><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, they were baptized <S%G907><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> men <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> women <S%G1135><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when he was baptized <S%G907><s%>, he continued <S%G2258><s%> <S%G4342><s%> with Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> wondered <S%G1839><s%>, beholding <S%G2334><s%> the miracles <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> <S%G3173><s%> which were done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1096><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when the apostles <S%G652><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%> had received <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, they sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>:

Who <S%G3748><s%>, when they were come down <S%G2597><s%>, prayed <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3704><s%> they might receive <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>:

(For <S%G1063><s%> as yet <S%G3768><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> fallen <S%G1968><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>: only <S%G3440><s%> <S%G1161><s%> they were <S%G5225><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.)
Then <S%G5119><s%> laid they <S%G2007><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they received <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when Simon <S%G4613><s%> saw <S%G2300><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> laying on <S%G1936><s%> of the apostles' <S%G652><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%>, he offered <S%G4374><s%> them <S%G846><s%> money <S%G5536><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, Give <S%G1325><s%> me also <S%G2504><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> power <S%G1849><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>, he may receive <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Thy <S%G4675><s%> money <S%G694><s%> perish <S%G1498><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G684><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast thought <S%G3543><s%> that the gift <S%G1431><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> may be purchased <S%G2932><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> money <S%G5536><s%>.

Thou <S%G4671><s%> hast <S%G2076><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> part <S%G3310><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> lot <S%G2819><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> matter <S%G3056><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> right <S%G2117><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Repent <S%G3340><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> of <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> wickedness <S%G2549><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G1189><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> perhaps <S%G686><s%> the thought <S%G1963><s%> of thine <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> may be forgiven <S%G863><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I perceive <S%G3708><s%> that thou <S%G4571><s%> art <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the gall <S%G5521><s%> of bitterness <S%G4088><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in the bond <S%G4886><s%> of iniquity <S%G93><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, Pray <S%G1189><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, that <S%G3704><s%> none of these things <S%G3367><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have spoken <S%G2046><s%> come <S%G1904><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>.

And they, when <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> they had testified <S%G1263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preached <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, returned <S%G5290><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> in many <S%G4183><s%> villages <S%G2968><s%> of the Samaritans <S%G4541><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Arise <S%G450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> toward <S%G2596><s%> the south <S%G3314><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> that goeth down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Gaza <S%G1048><s%>, which <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> desert <S%G2048><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, a man <S%G435><s%> of Ethiopia <S%G128><s%>, an eunuch <S%G2135><s%> of great authority <S%G1413><s%> under Candace <S%G2582><s%> queen <S%G938><s%> of the Ethiopians <S%G128><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2258><s%> the charge of <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> her <S%G846><s%> treasure <S%G1047><s%>, and <S%G3739><s%> had come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> for to worship <S%G4352><s%>,

<S%G5037><s%>Was <S%G2258><s%> returning <S%G5290><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> chariot <S%G716><s%> <S%G2532><s%> read <S%G314><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto Philip <S%G5376><s%>, Go near <S%G4334><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> join thyself to <S%G2853><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> chariot <S%G716><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> ran <S%G4370><s%> thither to him, and heard <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%> read <S%G314><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Understandest thou <S%G687><s%> <S%G1065><s%> <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> thou readest <S%G314><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, How <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4459><s%> can I <S%G302><s%> <S%G1410><s%>, except <S%G3362><s%> some man <S%G5100><s%> should guide <S%G3594><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? And <S%G5037><s%> he desired <S%G3870><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> that he would come up <S%G305><s%> and sit <S%G2523><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>The place <S%G4042><s%> of the scripture <S%G1124><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he read <S%G314><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> this <S%G3778><s%>, He was led <S%G71><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a sheep <S%G4263><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the slaughter <S%G4967><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a lamb <S%G286><s%> dumb <S%G880><s%> before <S%G1726><s%> his <S%G846><s%> shearer <S%G2751><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> opened he <S%G455><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>:

In <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> humiliation <S%G5014><s%> his <S%G846><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> was taken away <S%G142><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> shall declare <S%G1334><s%> his <S%G846><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>? for <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> is taken <S%G142><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the eunuch <S%G2135><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, I pray <S%G1189><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> speaketh <S%G3004><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>? of <S%G4012><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> other man <S%G2087><s%>?

Then <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the same <S%G5026><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%>, and preached <S%G2097><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they went <S%G4198><s%> on <S%G2596><s%> their way <S%G3598><s%>, they came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the eunuch <S%G2135><s%> said <S%G5346><s%>, See <S%G2400><s%>, here is water <S%G5204><s%>; what <S%G5101><s%> doth hinder <S%G2967><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou believest <S%G4100><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> all thine <S%G3650><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, thou mayest <S%G1832><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, I believe <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2753><s%> the chariot <S%G716><s%> to stand still <S%G2476><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they went down <S%G2597><s%> both <S%G297><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the eunuch <S%G2135><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he baptized <S%G907><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they were come up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%>, the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> caught away <S%G726><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> <S%G2532><s%>, that the eunuch <S%G2135><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3756><s%> him <S%G846><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%>: and <S%G1063><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> on his <S%G846><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> rejoicing <S%G5463><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> Azotus <S%G108><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> passing <S%G1330><s%> through he preached <S%G2097><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> he <S%G846><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>.
